text: Rise to Power is the third studio album by American extreme metal band Battlecross. It was released through Metal Blade Records on August 21, 2015. It is the only album to feature Alex Bent on drums. The first single from the album, "Not Your Slave", was released on 27 May 2015, followed by "Spoiled" on 29 June 2015. On 19 August 2015, the album was made available for streaming at Metal Hammer. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Kyle Gunther – vocals *Tony Asta – lead guitar *Hiran Deraniyagala – rhythm guitar *Don Slater – bass *Alex Bent – drums == Chart performance == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2013) !Peak position |- |US Heatseekers Albums (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"|4 |- |US Billboard 200 (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"|137 |} == References == Category:2015 albums Category:Battlecross albums Category:Metal Blade Records albums Category:Albums produced by Jason Suecof
title: Rise to Power (Battlecross album)
